mapper.select: select rownum rnum, allList.* from (select ad.a_name,dd.d_name, pb.* from petition_board pb,area_data ad, detail_data dd where b_addinfo=dd.a_no and b_detailinfo = dd.d_no and b_addinfo=ad.a_no and b_agree >= 5 and b_addinfo=#{a_no} and b_enddate >=sysdate order by b_detailinfo) allList where b_delno='N'

select count(*) from (select ad.a_name,dd.d_name, pb.* from petition_board pb,area_data ad, detail_data dd where b_addinfo=dd.a_no and b_detailinfo = dd.d_no and b_addinfo=ad.a_no and b_agree >= 5 and b_addinfo=52 and b_enddate >=sysdate order by b_detailinfo) allList where b_delno='N'

select * from ( select rownum rnum, allList.*, rank() over(order by b_agree desc) as ranking from (select ad.a_name,dd.d_name, pb.* from petition_board pb,area_data ad, detail_data dd where b_addinfo=dd.a_no and b_detailinfo = dd.d_no and b_addinfo=ad.a_no and b_agree >= 5 and b_addinfo=52 and b_enddate >=sysdate order by b_detailinfo) allList ) where b_delno='N' and ranking <= 3 order by ranking
